SensibleDTU

Jul 29, 2013

We are getting closer to full deployment for SensibleDTU - 2013 (~1000 phones!). Image shows an artistic rendering of the DTU campus using the data obtained from the 2012 deployment (~200 phones).

Bluetooth Network

How do we as humans interact over the course of a day? The video shows proximity interactions for student participating in the SensibleDTU project for a randomly chosen 24-hour interval.
